data.title: Kuala Lumpur Sentral Station
data.meta_description: Find out everything you need to know about Kuala Lumpur Sentral station, Malaysia on Rail.Ninja! General info, address, popular routes, FAQ and many more.
data.text:
Address:

Brickfields, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

The Kuala Lumpur Sentral station is the largest railway station of Kuala Lumpur, the capital of Malaysia, as well as the biggest one in Malaysia! Being the significant transport hub, the Kuala Lumpur Sentral train station accommodates more than 100,000 people per day. Apart from its modern trains, the station is also linked with the vast shopping mall, hotels, restaurants, and offices.

The Largest Train Station in Malaysia by Volume: Kuala Lumpur Sentral

Kuala Lumpur Sentral Railway Station impresses with its vast size, vivid life full of travelers, and architectural beauty. Check out the video to get a brief insight into the stunning Kuala Lumpur Sentral Station interiors and understand how to navigate around this busy railway station.

F.A.Q.

Getting Around Kuala Lumpur Sentral Railway Station

Where is the Kuala Lumpur Sentral station located?

The Kuala Lumpur Sentral station is situated along Jalan Damansara and Jalan Travers, in the heart of Kuala Lumpur Sentral Center Business District.

What to see around the Kuala Lumpur Sentral Station?

It is easy to reach many tourist attractions from the Kuala Lumpur Sentral station. There are the top 5:

The Petronas Twin Towers

The KLCC Park

The National Mosque (Masjid Negara)

The Islamic Arts Museum Malaysia

The Thean Hou Temple

Read more F.A.Q.
